Hi! My name is Kim.


I'm a software engineer who is passionate about web and mobile development.

I'm an avid learner with experience in client-side and server-side web development using AngularJS, Django, Flask, and Jekyll.

When I'm not coding, I'm either wandering around the city, cooking or just working on side projects.

I'm currently learning react and react-native.

Projects

t譯: translateMe

Swift
Mobile
NSUserDefaults

t譯: translateMe is an app to assist in increasing English vocabulary words. This app identifies the image's contents with English words which are then translated to the language you select. In addition, you will be able to hear the audio both the English word and translated word.

Yabego Studios

React
AWS
Responsive

This project is in working progress for a friend who wanted to simplify and revamp their portfolio.

This project was built using React and Wordpress(as the CMS) hosted on AWS using the LAMP stack. The website is deployed on Heroku.

Where Is My Bus?

Swift
Mobile
Core Data

An iOS app to find the nearest mta bus stop, get the bus that stops at thet stop and each of the time of the next coming bus. Where Is My Bus? is built with swift and using the MTA Bus API.
